channel.title: Pk Dupe?
channel.description: Okay well there's a method that people were using on my server.. It's called pk duping. If you're not familiar with it, it's when you die, and as soon as you die, you Xlog. Then the person can pick up the items, but when you log back in, you have them still. Can anyone help?

item.title: Pk Dupe?
item.dc:creator: @FuryofEdge FuryofEdge
item.description:
@FuryofEdge wrote:

Thanks a lot bro.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Dupe?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

add this with all your other ints


	public int disconnectedDelay = 0;

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Dupe?
item.dc:creator: @FuryofEdge FuryofEdge
item.description:
@FuryofEdge wrote:

client.java:17269: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable disconnectedDelay
location: class client
disconnectedDelay = 30;
^
Note: EconomyBoost.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Dupe?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Search

// End of login procedure

at the end add this

if(!logoutButton && inCombat) { disconnected = false; disconnectedDelay = 30; }

hopefully that does it.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Dupe?

item.description:
@FuryofEdge wrote:

Okay well there’s a method that people were using on my server… It’s called pk duping. If you’re not familiar with it, it’s when you die, and as soon as you die, you Xlog. Then the person can pick up the items, but when you log back in, you have them still. Can anyone help?
